medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain for 3 days
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began suddenly 3 days prior to presentation. It was sharp and crampy, intensified, and worsened leading to fevers. Prior to this, the patient was able to work, but symptoms escalated requiring a visit to the PCP. The patient experienced an episode of loose stools approximately 6 days prior to presentation, which has since resolved. Currently, the patient reports being more constipated than usual.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of IBD or colon cancer
